group_1.textLeft: The main idea behind the picture book I want to create… is “friends”.
Since I want it to be a story that entertains @*and* encourages the readers,
I’d like the main character, the young girl, to be a positive and hard-working individual...

group_1.textRight: Then if you were to picture the heroine,
would she be the energetic type, who’s always @active outside?

group_1.textLeft: Hmm… I’d say she’s more the type to normally @be quiet and obedient,
but she rises to the occasion when the time @calls for it and is extremely smart.
However, you’d get the impression she’s sort of @lonely…

group_1.textRight: Hm, hm…
I might have an idea of what this girl looks like.

group_1.textLeft: Really…?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, although even if I say that,
I was just thinking quiet and smart kids probably @wear glasses, something like that.
That’s all I had.

group_1.textLeft: I see…
You got a handle on her personality traits, @then considered her appearance.

group_1.textRight: Ah, I guess so.

group_1.textLeft: Then let’s try drawing her based on our ideas @of her…!

group_1.narration: -Sana- @(I wonder if long hair would be better… @Ah, but maybe short hair would be cute too…)
-Sana- @(Should she have big, bright eyes…? @Or small, round ones…?)
-Sana- @(For her outfit, it won’t be suitable for traveling if it’s too cute…)

group_1.textRight: Ehehe… Take a look!
Her hair’s fluffy and floaty, and I also gave her @glasses.
Besides that, I tried to make her look more lonely @with downward-slanted eyes.

group_1.textLeft: Wow…! She’s so cute…!

group_1.textRight: Really?

group_1.textLeft: Ui-chan, you’re so good at drawing, I’m jealous…

group_1.textRight: I just draw things I like.
Sketching? I’ve never even practiced doing anything @like that. I’m terrible at drawing...

group_1.textLeft: No, you’re wrong.
Your lines and color composition have this softness @to them. They’re very cute...

group_1.textRight: Thanks…!
The girl Sana-san’s drawing looks a little bit like Onee-chan, doesn’t she?

group_1.textLeft: Ah… I guess you noticed in the end…
I can’t draw purely from my imagination like @Ui-chan does...

group_1.textRight: So instead of cartoonish stuff,
Sana-san’s better at drawing pictures that look @more realistic, right?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah… I’m good at drawing things I’ve seen before...

group_1.textRight: I knew it!

group_1.textLeft: …Maybe this time I’ll try modeling the @main character after someone...
That way I’ll have an easier time drawing her too…

group_1.textRight: That makes sense.
As it is, will you make the main character look @similar to Onee-chan?

group_1.textLeft: I’d be okay with that too, but…
I actually do have someone else in mind… @I think it should be based on her...

group_1.textRight: Eh, who?

group_1.textLeft: It would be...

group_1.textRight: Oh, Ai-san…!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah…!
I’ve decided on my picture book’s theme and @the main character’s appearance…
Now’s the perfect time to dive into writing @my story…!

group_1.textRight: Ah, wait, Sana-san. There’s still something really important you haven’t picked.

group_1.textLeft: Huh…? What is it…!?

group_1.textRight: What’s the heroine’s name?

group_1.textLeft: Ah… Her name…

group_1.narration: Leaving the “Land of Beginnings”, @Aoi set out on her journey.
The first location she arrived at was the @“Land of Blessings”, resplendent with natural beauty. @The residents of this land took great pride in their @fluffy fur.
Everyone was delighted to see her, @and her heart soared as she thought, @“Maybe I’ll be able to make friends here.”
However, there was one problem with this land...
